data.author: JoRy

changelog.release_notes: Bugfix & Updated for Pebble watch firmware 4.0.1.
Minor improvement.
Fixed bug - Sunrise & Sunset data missing for some users.
Added option to light watch up all the time on AC power.
Added DAILY STEPS GOAL - specific vibration pattern when you reach your daily steps goal (1000-20000 steps a day).
Sun data are refreshed as soon as you save Settings if enabled and then during the day.
Added option to show Sunset & Sunrise time instead of Sleep/Deep sleep time.

Less radio communication overall, more battery saving I hope.
Also, weather is now cached on watch for some time and not refreshed every watchface startup (less radio comm. also).

Few power consumption related improvements.
- Hourly vibration added.
- New icon for Steps data (replaced word "steps").
- Distance (in Kilometers/Miles) can be enabled in Settings next to steps count.

Added Hungarian localization.
Build with latest Pebble firmware.

Bugfix release. One byte less and you can't sleep for more than 10 hours :-) fixed.
Also, weather FORECAST can't be launched during sleep.
And, sorry for forum issues (WEBSITE LINK in app store) - Pebble migrated forum and something went wrong. Description of watchface disappeared and moreover I can't edit this post.
New option to hide battery power level with symbol above for watchface designs without numbers.
Battery icon behaviour changed - shows only when battery is under 10%.
PT/PTS numbers show/hide config is now persistent.

New Option to hide numbers even for PT/PTS.
PTR got this design option few weeks ago.

Forecast loading will not start when no BT connection.
Fixed one memory leak related to seconds hand & config refresh.

Bugfix release related to Forecast & Watchface is not responding message.
Never happened to me though.
Fixed minor bug caused crash for some users.
Thanks Mike for feedback about forecast loading animation not in center on PTR.
Minor improvement about WU forecast data.

data.description:
ModernNew.

Optimized for power saving. Localizations and many more can be configured in Settings including Yr.no/WU weather providers, Forecast, Health and so. Basic watchface is for free, but Settings is a paid feature. You can read more about it in Settings.

Pebble HEALTH: When watch detect that you're sleeping, watchface decrease display update cycle & weather update to conserve more battery energy. ENABLE it in app Settings, it is DISABLED by default.

Please READ the WEBSITE LINK down below for more info and more detailed description of watchface and all functions.

latest_release.release_notes: Bugfix & Updated for Pebble watch firmware 4.0.1.

data.title: Modern New
